meanings.definition: A sharp turn or reversal in direction.
meanings.sent1: The car made a quick uey to avoid the traffic.
meanings.sent2: I almost missed the street, so I had to make a uey.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel did a uey to dodge the cat chasing it.
meanings.sent4: Her decision to quit her job was like a uey in her career path.
meanings.sent5: The sudden uey of the river surprised the hikers.

meanings.definition: To make a sharp turn or reversal in direction.
meanings.sent1: He had to uey the bike to avoid the pothole.
meanings.sent2: She ueyed the conversation when it started getting awkward.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to uey away from the water spray.
meanings.sent4: The company decided to uey its marketing strategy for better results.
meanings.sent5: The pilot had to uey the plane to avoid a collision.
